entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is described as reappearing in classes with bandages and a sling on his right arm. He is acting like the heroic survivor of some dreadful battle.

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: Pansy Parkinson is mentioned as simpering over Malfoy's injury.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as being winked at by Malfoy when Pansy looked away.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as being winked at by Malfoy when Pansy looked away.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as the head of Slytherin House and favoring his own students.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as scowling at Ron and noticing Malfoy's wink at Crabbe and Goyle.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as scowling at Harry.

relationships.description: Snape favors Malfoy in his classes.
Malfoy winks at Crabbe when Pansy looks away.
